alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:34PM MDT until August 29 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... Southwestern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... Northern Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Northwestern Loving County in western Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/. * At 634 PM CDT/534 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bluff Reservoir, or 30 miles southeast of Carlsbad, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Red Bluff Reservoir and Red Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
